subject: Re: [Request received] Oncobeta - What enquiry forms go where
preview: ##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support,  We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support, We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below: https://support.combinate.me/requests/30389/satisfaction/new/Y9ciJk8BobRuiORKZmMjksidU?locale=1176 Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about: Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 14 May 2025, 17:01 GMT+10 Thank you, Cindy! We can close our ticket now. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 14 May 2025, 15:36 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa. Great! The total time spent on all the requests was 1 hour. Thanks, Cindy Valderama support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2928773455-152880#}

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30389) has been solved. To reopen this request, reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30389 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 14 May 2025, 17:01 GMT+10 Thank you, Cindy! We can close our ticket now. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 14 May 2025, 15:36 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa. Great! The total time spent on all the requests was 1 hour. Thanks, Cindy Valderama support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google!   • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month

If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2928773455-152880#}

Hi Alyssa.

Great!

The total time spent on all the requests was 1 hour.

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30389) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30389 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 14 May 2025, 15:01 GMT+10 Thanks, Cindy. The updates are all good. Can we know the total time we've used on our ticket? Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 13 May 2025, 20:42 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa. I've updated the footer email to admin-au@oncobeta.com and added clickable links for both the email address and phone number. If there's anything else you'd like adjusted, feel free to let me know. Happy to help! Thanks, Cindy Valderama support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google!   • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month

If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2928773455-152880#}

Hi Alyssa.

I’ve updated the footer email to admin-au@oncobeta.com and added clickable links for both the email address and phone number.

If there’s anything else you’d like adjusted, feel free to let me know. Happy to help!

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30389) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30389 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 12 May 2025, 16:48 GMT+10 Hi Cindy, The client just confirmed we want to update the footer email as well. Thanks for pointing this out. We can go ahead with this change. Let us know once, thanks! Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 8 May 2025, 12:30 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa. All good now. I'll be waiting for your feedback regarding the footer. ##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30389) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30389 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 8 May 2025, 12:27 GMT+10 Thanks, Cindy! I'll confirm with the client if we need to change the footer. For now, can we reduce the padding in the container so we can display the email all in one line? Something like this https://cbo.d.pr/i/k8vte6 please? Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 8 May 2025, 12:22 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa. Change of email on Contact Page is completed. Should we also change the email displayed in footer section? It's currently info@oncobeta.com.au. Let me know so I can change right away. Regards, Cindy Thanks, Cindy Valderama support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google!   • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2928773455-152880#}

Hi Alyssa.

Change of email on Contact Page is completed.

Should we also change the email displayed in footer section? It's currently info@oncobeta.com.au.

Let me know so I can change right away.

Regards,
Cindy

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30389) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30389 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 8 May 2025, 11:29 GMT+10 Thank you, Cindy! I think we just missed one point, which was likely lost due to my multiple emails yesterday-sorry about that! But can we also change the contact email listed in the Contact Us page to admin-au@oncobeta.com? Let us know once done as well, thank you! Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 8 May 2025, 11:17 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa. All change requests has been implemented.
  • Change emails on Contact Page and Media Enquiry Page to admin-au@oncobeta.com.
  • Remove the subscription form in homepage banner.
  • Change button to download file in Healthcare Provider Page.
    • Please note that we can only add the link of the PDF so I uploaded it to the website and when the button is clicked, it opens the PDF to the new window where users can download it.
One hour time tracked for this ticket is good. Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with. Regards, Cindy Thanks, Cindy Valderama support@wolfiq.com.au Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2928773455-152880#}

Hi Alyssa.

All change requests has been implemented.
  • Change emails on Contact Page and Media Enquiry Page to admin-au@oncobeta.com.
  • Remove the subscription form in homepage banner.
  • Change button to download file in Healthcare Provider Page.
    • Please note that we can only add the link of the PDF so I uploaded it to the website and when the button is clicked, it opens the PDF to the new window where users can download it.

One hour time tracked for this ticket is good.

Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

Regards,
Cindy

Hello Alyssa.

Currently checking and making changes as per request.

I'll let you know once these are completed.

Thank you.

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30389) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30389 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 8 May 2025, 10:29 GMT+10 Hi team, Just bumping this ticket as the client has raised these updates as urgent. Please give us an update today if possible. Thank you. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 7 May 2025, 17:22 GMT+10 Hey team, As for our original points, see below action points in bold. Can we get these actioned urgently?
  • info@oncobeta.com.au form sends to info@oncobeta.com.au - please send to admin-au@oncobeta.com instead
  • Media Enquiry Page form sends to j.griffiths@oncobeta.com- please send to admin-au@oncobeta.com instead
As for these additional items:
  • The learn more section at the top of our webpage, if you put in an email address what happens? https://www.oncobeta.com.au/. It didn't seem to work as the following pop up appeared.
    • This should be connected to your MailChimp account for newsletter/subscription purposes. The API added on the website is currently invalid and we need a new API key for the submission to work.
    • Can we please just take this off the site? https://cbo.d.pr/i/yJlHBU
  • Another pop up when I tried to download the clinician brochure on the Healthcare providers page? - https://www.oncobeta.com.au/healthcare-providers/
    • Upon clicking the download button, can we remove the form and have the file just be downloaded automatically?
    • Here is the PDF https://cbo.d.pr/f/8tgkzP
With the Contact Us page update (previous email), can we round off the updates in this ticket in 1 hour or so? If not, please let us know how much time we spend. Thank you! Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 7 May 2025, 16:21 GMT+10 Hi Cindy, Thanks. I'm getting the Mailchimp API from the client. In the Contact Us page https://www.oncobeta.com.au/contact-us/, can we change the Contact email to admin-au@oncobeta.com? Please also let us know the total number of minutes we have used on this ticket so we can charge the client accordingly. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 7 May 2025, 09:14 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa. Here are the emails that will be receiving notifications upon form submissions:
  • info@oncobeta.com.au form sends to info@oncobeta.com.au
  • Media Enquiry Page form sends to j.griffiths@oncobeta.com
Client's questions:
  • The learn more section at the top of our webpage, if you put in an email address what happens? https://www.oncobeta.com.au/. It didn't seem to work as the following pop up appeared.
    • This should be connected to your MailChimp account for the newsletter/subscription purposes. The API added on the website is currently invalid and we need a new API key for the submission to work. [img class="c15">
  • Another pop up when I tried to download the clinician brochure on the Healthcare providers page? - https://www.oncobeta.com.au/healthcare-providers/
    • This has the same issue as above.
  • For future testing, will they be notified if we perform test submissions in Staging? https://stg-oncobeta-stg.kinsta.cloud/
    • We will be changing the email when we test in staging website so client shouldn't be notified when we test submissions.
  • Also, can you confirm if these errors are new or did they exist prior to our Migration?
    • I cannot confirm if this exists prior to the migration but if the API is invalid, it could be that their MailChimp account is expired or have changed.
Please let me know if you have further questions and if you need assistance on the MailChimp setup. Regards, Cindy Thanks, Cindy Valderama support@wolfiq.com.au <img alt="wolfiq.com.au" width="250" height="88" border="0" class="c17"]https://lh3.google.com/u/0/d/1m3NYUuXtUVyZ313zB6byGDnpd4zEEcb2=w3024-h1646-iv2[/img] Impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15 minutes / month
  • Pro Care Plans - 120 minutes / month
  • Expert Care Plans - 300 minutes / month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $129/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2928773455-152880#}

Hi Alyssa.

Here are the emails that will be receiving notifications upon form submissions:
  • Contact Page form sends to info@oncobeta.com.au
  • Media Enquiry Page form sends to j.griffiths@oncobeta.com

Client's questions:
  • The learn more section at the top of our webpage, if you put in an email address what happens? https://www.oncobeta.com.au/. It didn't seem to work as the following pop up appeared.
    • This should be connected to your MailChimp account for the newsletter/subscription purposes. The API added on the website is currently invalid and we need a new API key for the submission to work.

  • Another pop up when I tried to download the clinician brochure on the Healthcare providers page? - https://www.oncobeta.com.au/healthcare-providers/
    • This has the same issue as above.
  • For future testing, will they be notified if we perform test submissions in Staging? https://stg-oncobeta-stg.kinsta.cloud/
    • We will be changing the email when we test in staging website so client shouldn't be notified when we test submissions.
  • Also, can you confirm if these errors are new or did they exist prior to our Migration?
    • I cannot confirm if this exists prior to the migration but if the API is invalid, it could be that their MailChimp account is expired or have changed.

Please let me know if you have further questions and if you need assistance on the MailChimp setup.

Regards,
Cindy
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi @ricaR.

Just adding on Manuel's updates:
  • Contact Page form sends to info@oncobeta.com.au
  • Media Enquiry Page form sends to j.griffiths@oncobeta.com

Client's questions:
  • The learn more section at the top of our webpage, if you put in an email address what happens? https://www.oncobeta.com.au/. It didn't seem to work as the following pop up appeared.
    • This should be connected to your MailChimp account for the newsletter/subscription purposes. The API added on the website is currently invalid and we need a new API key for the submission to work.

  • Another pop up when I tried to download the clinician brochure on the Healthcare providers page? - https://www.oncobeta.com.au/healthcare-providers/
    • This has the same issue as above.
  • For future testing, will they be notified if we perform test submissions in Staging? https://stg-oncobeta-stg.kinsta.cloud/
    • We will be changing the email when we test in staging website so client shouldn't be notified when we test submissions.
  • Also, can you confirm if these errors are new or did they exist prior to our Migration?
    • I cannot confirm if this exists prior to the migration but if the API is invalid, it could be that their MailChimp account is expired or have changed.


(Time: 30mins)
